title: Emergency Gear Extension Test
description: Comprehensive test to test emergency gear extension mechanism
preconditions: Aircraft on jacks with gear safety pins installed
All required test equipment calibrated and available
Safety protocols reviewed and in place
test_steps: 9. Power down and secure test setup
expected_results: System shall test emergency gear extension mechanism
No error messages or warnings displayed
actual_results: System partially test emergency gear extension mechanism
notes: Test failed due to response time exceeding specification. Defect report DR-2025-0123 filed.
